id.description: [string]The id of this effect. Referenced when playing/stopping this particle effect.

trigger_on_spawn.description: [bool]Should this effect be triggered on spawn?

on_destroy.description: The strategy on how to handle the particle effect when this entity is destroyed.

on_replace.description: The strategy on how to handle the particle effect when this entity is trying to play an effect that already exists.

on_death.description: The strategy on how to handle the particle effect when this entity dies.

on_stop.description: The strategy on how to handle the particle effect when we stop the particle effect via effect reference.
